trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for Dynamic Data table providers.
trans-unit.target: 为动态数据表提供程序提供基类。

trans-unit.source: Table providers must extend this class.
trans-unit.target: 表提供程序必须扩展此类。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to SQL classes and the ADO.NET Entity data model are providers that extend this class.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 类和 ADO.NET 实体数据模型都是可扩展此类的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The model that the table belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 表所属的模型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider" /> class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider" /> 类的新实例以供继承的类实例使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes that are defined for the table that is represented by this provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取为此提供程序表示的表定义的特性。

trans-unit.source: The attribute collection.
trans-unit.target: 特性集合。

trans-unit.source: The user.
trans-unit.target: 用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to delete items from the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否允许用户从表中删除项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is allowed to delete items from the table; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户从表中删除项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The user.
trans-unit.target: 用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to insert items into the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否允许用户向表中插入项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is allowed to insert items into the table; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户向表中插入项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The user.
trans-unit.target: 用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to read items in the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否允许用户读取表中的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is allowed to read items in the table; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户读取表中的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The user.
trans-unit.target: 用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to update items in the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否允许用户更新表中的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is allowed to update items in the table; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户更新表中的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of columns in this table.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取此表中的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of columns in this table.
trans-unit.target: 此表中的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the table from the data context.
trans-unit.target: 从数据上下文获取表的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the table.
trans-unit.target: 表的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type that represents the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示表的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type that represents the table.
trans-unit.target: 表示表的类型。

trans-unit.source: The row to get the foreign-key value for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取其外键值的行。

trans-unit.source: The name of the foreign-key column.
trans-unit.target: 外键列的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of a foreign key for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定行的外键的值。

trans-unit.source: The foreign key.
trans-unit.target: 外键。

trans-unit.source: The data context for the table.
trans-unit.target: 表的数据上下文。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> object that in turn returns the elements of the table.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，返回 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> 对象，而该对象则返回表的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> object that returns the elements of the table.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> 对象，该对象返回表的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type descriptor for the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取表的类型说明符。

trans-unit.source: The type descriptor for the table.
trans-unit.target: 表的类型说明符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the table.
trans-unit.target: 获取表的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the table.
trans-unit.target: 表的名称。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the name of the table property in the data-context class.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是数据上下文类中的表属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent type.
trans-unit.target: 获取父类型。

trans-unit.source: The parent type if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果实体有父级，则为父类型；否则为 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root type for this entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取此实体的根类型。

trans-unit.source: The root type for this entity if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果实体有父级，则为此实体的根类型；否则为 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider" /> 实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name" /> property is <see langword="null" />, the base class <see langword="Name" /> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />，则返回基类 <see langword="Name" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在用于调试目的。
